title: Instant Pot Broccoli Cheddar Soup
description: Delicious instant pot broccoli cheddar soup recipe

ingredients.name: 2 or 3 carrots, match-stick style or grated or diced
chicken broth (or 3 cups of water and 3 tsp of Better than Bouillon Chicken Base)

instructions: 1. Initial Sauté- Turn Instant Pot to saute ("more")- Melt 1 Tbsp butter- Add diced onion, sauté 3 minutes
2. Add Vegetables- Add celery, carrots, broccoli, chicken broth
3. Pressure Cook- Lock lid, set valve to "sealing"- Manual/pressure cook: 1 minute- Natural release: 5 minutes- Quick release remaining pressure
4. While Pot Heats Up:- Melt 1/4 cup butter in microwave- Whisk in flour until creamy- Optional: Heat milk- Grate cheddar cheese

5. Final Steps- Return pot to sauté mode- Whisk 1 cup broth into butter-flour mixture- Add mixture back to pot- Stir until thickened- Add milk, heat through- Stir in cheese until melted- Add salt and pepper
Optional: For Thicker Soup- Mix 2 Tbsp cornstarch + 2 Tbsp cold water- Stir into soup
STORAGE:- Refrigerate up to 1 week- Should freeze well (untested)​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​
